data.eml:eml: Asplenium merapohense (Aspleniaceae), a new species from the Peninsular Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jaman, Razali, Kamin, Imin, Kiew, Ruth (2017): Asplenium merapohense (Aspleniaceae), a new species from the Peninsular Malaysia. PhytoKeys 89: 85-90, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.89.20875, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.89.20875
